about_me_text1: Hi, I am a frontend developer based in Cloppenburg, Germany. My background in International Business Engineering and experience in technical purchasing and product management have given me a broad perspective. However, my true passion has always been programming. After realizing how much I enjoy developing, I dedicated myself entirely to frontend development. This combination of diverse experience and technical passion shapes my work today.
about_me_text2: I am passionate about creating complex web applications that are not only functional, but also provide an intuitive user experience and make the most of the latest technologies.
about_me_text3: Pushing myself to take on new challenges gives me the drive to learn more and become more knowledgeable.
my_skills_text: I have experience in building projects with various frontend technologies and concepts.
portfolio_text: Please explore a selection of my work - feel free to try it out.
join_description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize task using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories. This project was developed by group work.
el_pollo_loco_description: Jump, run, and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and Tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
contact_text1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
required_email_input: Please provide a valid email address.
checkbox_text3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
